data.system_settings: Android 5.1, Huawei CUN 29 Note: this bug does not occur on Android 7.0, but it does on lower version devices so please dont deny with android 7.0.
data.actual_result: It freezes. Note: It doesnt freezes randomly , so please try a few times(atleast 30 times) before adding an approve/deny
data.expected_result: It should open, so you get to add emojis
data.short_description: App randomly freezes while opening emoji picker
data.steps_to_repro: - This bug does not happen on devices over Android 5.1. - Open emoji picker
